thread.title: The Best, Worst & Most “WTF” Outfits From the 2017 Grammy Awards
thread.title_full: The Best, Worst & Most “WTF” Outfits From the 2017 Grammy Awards

author: Jake Boyer
title: The Best, Worst & Most “WTF” Outfits From the 2017 Grammy Awards
text:
As you may have heard, last night saw the telecast of the 2017 Grammys. Adele was the big winner of the night sweeping all the major categories, which was a choice that has led many to feel (rightfully) miffed, but we digress.
However, there is one, non- Lemonade -related aspect that we can all handily agree on: who crushed and who utterly flopped the red carpet. So without further ado, here are our picks for the best, the worst and the most ‘seriously WTF’ looks of the night.
Solange embraced the idea of dressing like a living award instead of winning one.
#Solange #Grammys #RedCarpet #aboutlastnight #iamrollingout 
A photo posted by Rolling Out (@rollingout) on Feb 13, 2017 at 6:29am PST 

Yes ScHoolboy Q. Just, yes.
🔺 Schoolboy Q na předávání cen Grammy. 📷 by @complex. #fashr #grammy #schoolboyq #grammy #hoover #fashion #style #killa #rapgod 
A photo posted by Fashr (@thefashr) on Feb 13, 2017 at 5:57am PST 

Hey Gaga, we heard you were doing a duet with Metallica? We just wanted to make sure that’s why you’re dressed as a motorbike-riding Angel of Death and not for some other reason…
#LadyGaga arrives as only she can 💯 #grammys #grammys2017 
A photo posted by Marie Claire (@marieclairemag) on Feb 12, 2017 at 5:05pm PST 

JLo you look like a literal gift. So we just want to say thank you.
#grammys2017 dress by @ralphandrusso Thank you @lorealmakeup and @lorealhair 
A photo posted by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Feb 12, 2017 at 7:39pm PST 

Ri, the hair is ace. The outfit? Good if you were going for Jo-Ann Fabrics Halloween realness, but otherwise it’s a miss.
On valide la coupe de cheveux de Rihanna hier aux Grammy Awards 😍 . . We validate the haristyld of Rihanna last night at Grammy's Awards 😍 . . . #rihanna #singee #actress #haircrush #hair #famous #glamour #beautiful #womancrush #wcw #goldenglobes #dress #blackhair #naturalhair #haircare #star #peopleschoisaward #redcarpet #singer #award #hairinspiration #longhair #redhair 
A photo posted by Polished Hair Care (@polishedhaircareparis) on Feb 13, 2017 at 6:41am PST 

Are those Fruity Pebbles on your teeth or are you just happy to be here Lil Yachty?
#LilYachty shows off his new grills on the red carpet this evening! Are we here for them? #Grammys2017 
A photo posted by The Shade Room (@theshaderoom) on Feb 12, 2017 at 4:18pm PST 

Points gained for variance in texture, points taken for that fit. I mean Katy, girl, have you seen what this silhouette does to your body?
Katy Perry Ayer en la Alfombra Roja de los Grammys. ¿Te Gusta como Luce? #KatyPerry #GRAMMYs 
A photo posted by RØXY F U C K† (@black_armyrx) on Feb 13, 2017 at 5:35am PST 

Seriously? Luckily I don’t know who this is, because if I did they would be dead to me.
We all know who won the Grammys 🇺🇸❤🇺🇸 #grammys #joyvilla #grammys2017 #maga #trump #beautiful #makeamericagreatagain #conservative 
A photo posted by Right Wing Conservative (@pres.donald.trump) on Feb 12, 2017 at 7:55pm PST 

2017: the year in which Cee-Lo Green had sex with Dr. Doom from Fantastic Four inside a vat of liquid gold and was forever changed.
#ceelogreen #grammys2017 #gold 
A photo posted by ⠠⠋⠳⠗⠀⠠⠋⠊⠧⠑⠀⠠⠎⠑⠒⠙⠎⠀ (@jasminefemaleshadyx) on Feb 13, 2017 at 6:28am PST 

Next up we have Girl Crush, the human gumball machine and/or the human ball-pit play pen.
Sometimes you gotta go to a kid's birthday party to play in a ball pit, and sometimes you just gotta be invited to the #Grammys. #GirlCrush brought the fun at the #Grammy Awards. 📷: @yamphoto 
A photo posted by Los Angeles Times (@latimes) on Feb 12, 2017 at 4:41pm PST 

Well, isn’t this just a cute and totally well-executed idea! Oh wait, it’s neither of those things.
Having a Blast at the #grammys2017 wearing my inspirations! #artist #singersongwriter #electropop #andresoriano Fabulous dress by @officialandresoriano make-up @nicholerayartistry 
A photo posted by Jacqueline Van Bierk (@jacquelinevanbierk) on Feb 12, 2017 at 2:14pm PST 

Speaking of neither well-executed nor cute ideas.. Taraji, you are a wonderfully talented performer and have a lot of other qualities that go beyond the quality of your red carpet look.
Details… Are we feeling #TarajiPHenson's look? She wore a lilac #MarcJacob dress for tonight's awards. 💜💜(📸Alberto E. Rodriguez/Getty) #Grammys2017 #Grammys #WBLS 
A photo posted by 107.5 WBLS (@wbls1075nyc) on Feb 12, 2017 at 6:56pm PST 

Be sure to read our coverage of the 2017 Grammys right here .
